name: 网易云音乐Material
description: 一个可以使网易云变得伪Material的主题。

user.name: 8qewt
user.about:
简介

我就是个中国初中生，没啥好说的了。

div.zcnt{padding-top:0!important;padding-left:24px!important;padding-bottom:0!important;padding-right:0!important;border:none}div.m-layer div.zcnt div div.zcnt{padding:0!important}div.m-layer .lyct{padding:0!important;text-indent:0;text-align:left}div.m-layer .lybtn{margin:24px 0;height:24px}div.m-layer .lybtn a,div.m-layer .lyct .btn .u-btn2{margin:0;float:right;clear:both;margin-right:24px;box-shadow:none;padding:0 12px;font-weight:700;background:0 0;margin-bottom:8px}div.m-layer .lybtn a:hover,div.m-layer .lyct .btn .u-btn2:hover{background:rgba(200,200,200,.2)}div.m-layer .lybtn a:active,div.m-layer .lyct .btn .u-btn2:hover{background:rgba(200,200,200,.5)}div.m-layer .lybtn a i,div.m-layer .lyct .btn .u-btn2 i{padding:0;color:#6cf;font-size:12px}.m-crgd .tip,.m-crgd .u-err{margin:4px 0 12px 0}div.m-layer{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22),0 0 0 9999px rgba(0,0,0,.4);animation:shadow .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1) 0s 1}@keyframes shadow{from{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22),0 0 0 9999px rgba(0,0,0,0)}to{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22),0 0 0 9999px rgba(0,0,0,.4)}}.m-pbar .time,.m-pbar .time em{color:#fff;text-shadow:none}input[type=checkbox]{height:18px;width:18px;-webkit-appearance:none}input[type=checkbox]:after{color:#aaa;position:relative;top:6px;left:0;content:"check_box_outline_blank"}input[type=checkbox][disabled=true]:after{color:#ddd}input[type=checkbox][disabled=true]:before{padding-top:8px;color:#ddd;position:absolute;content:"close"}input[type=checkbox]:checked:after{content:"check_box"}input[type=radio]{height:18px;width:18px;-webkit-appearance:none}input[type=radio]:after{color:#aaa;position:relative;top:6px;left:0;content:"radio_button_unchecked"}input[type=radio][disabled=true]:after{color:#ddd}input[type=radio][disabled=true]:before{padding-top:8px;font-size:18px;color:#ddd;position:absolute;content:"close"}input[type=radio]:checked:after{content:"radio_button_checked"}.m-lyric .u-bread1-1{border-bottom-color:#6cf}.m-playbar .tip{color:#000;background-color:#eee;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22);transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);padding:4px 0;height:auto;animation:op .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}@keyframes op{from{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}.m-vol .barbg{background-color:#eee;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.m-vol .vbg{background:rgba(169,201,255,.5);border-radius:4px}.m-vol .curr{background:#6cf}.m-vol .btn{background:#69f;border-radius:9999px;height:18px}div.m-layer .m-favgd{width:calc(100% - 24px)}.m-favgd .tit{background:#fff;padding-left:0;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}.m-favgd .tit:hover{background:#f2f2f2}.m-favgd ul li{padding-left:0;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}.u-btn-crt:after{color:#000;content:"add";position:relative;top:-24px;left:2px}.u-icn-25:after{padding-top:8px;font-size:14px;color:red;content:"error";position:relative;top:-2px}.m-crgd .u-txt{width:calc(100% - 48px)}.m-tlist{background:#eee;padding-left:0;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);border:none}.m-tlist:hover{background:#eee}.m-tlist .ltb{border:none}.m-tlist a{color:#000;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}.m-tlist a.itm-1{border-radius:4px 4px 0 0}.m-tlist a.itm-3{border-radius:0 0 4px 4px}.m-tlist a:hover{background:rgba(255,255,255,.7);color:#000}.u-cover-6 .msk{transition:all .8s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}.u-cover-6 .msk:hover{opacity:0}.mail{background:0 0;background-color:#eee;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}.mail:hover{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.mail:after{content:"chat";color:#777;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);position:relative;top:-28px;left:-22px}.m-tlist .icn:after{position:relative;top:-8px}.m-tlist .icn-hm:after{content:"person"}.m-tlist .icn-msg:after{content:"notifications"}.m-tlist .icn-lv:after{content:"trending_up"}.m-tlist .icn-mbr:after{content:"attach_money"}.m-tlist .icn-st:after{content:"settings"}.m-tlist .icn-ex:after{content:"power_settings_new"}.u-slt,.u-slt ul{border-radius:4px;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);border:1px solid #cdcdcd}.u-slt ul{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.u-slt:focus,.u-slt:hover{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.u-slt .btn:after{content:"arrow_drop_down";position:relative;top:6px;left:8px}.u-slt .curr,.u-slt ul a{color:#000;transition:all .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1)}.u-slt ul a:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.n-bind .delete .btn{background-color:#f77;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);transition:box-shadow .3s cubic-bezier(.25,.8,.25,1);color:#fff}.n-bind .delete .btn:hover{box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.m-playbar .list{background-color:#eee;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.25),0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.22)}.m-playbar .list li.z-sel .col,.m-playbar .list li.z-sel .col a,.m-playbar .list li.z-sel .col a:hover,.m-playbar .list li:hover .col,.m-playbar .list li:hover .col a,.m-playbar .list li:hover .col a:hover,.m-playbar .list ul,.m-playbar .listhdc .lytit,.m-playbar .listhdc a,.m-playbar .listhdc a:hover,.m-playbar .listhdc h4{color:#000}.m-playbar .list li.z-sel{background:rgba(102,204,255,.4)}.m-playbar .list li.z-sel:hover{background:rgba(102,204,255,.7)}.m-playbar .list li{border-radius:4px}.m-playbar .list li:hover{background:rgba(102,204,255,.2)}.m-playbar .listbd .bline{background:rgba(102,204,255,.4);border-radius:4px}.m-playbar .listbd .scrol{background:#6cf;border-radius:4px;border-color:#6cf}.m-playbar .listlyric p{color:rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.m-playbar .listlyric p.z-sel{color:rgba(0,0,0,1)!important}.m-playbar .addall .ico-add:after{content:"star"}.m-playbar .clear .icn-del:after{content:"delete"}.m-playbar .col .ico-src{text-indent:0;font-size:0;width:18px;height:18px;margin-top:5px}.m-playbar .col .ico-src:before{content:"link";font-size:18px;top:-5px;position:relative}
}

@-moz-document domain("music.163.com") {
/*
* 网易云音乐Material Stylish主题 v1.1.2 by 8qewt
* 自定义颜色！
*
* 本作品采用知识共享署名-相同方式共享 4.0 国际许可协议进行许可。
* 关于授权协议的详情在 <http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/> 。
*/

/*color为主颜色*/
.u-date .head,
.u-date .bd,
.m-table .mv:after,
.u-btni-unfav:after,
.m-table .ply-z-slt:before,
.s-fc6, a.s-fc6:hover,
.n-artist .btnfav-0:before,
.u-btn2 .icn-praised:after,
.u-icn2-13:after,
.u-icn-2:after,
div.m-layer .lybtn a i, div.m-layer .lyct .btn .u-btn2 i{
    color:rgba(102,204,255,1);
}

/*background-color,background为主颜色*/
.n-ban .dots .z-slt,
.m-playbar .bg, .m-playbar .updn .left, .m-playbar .updn .right,
.u-icn-37,
.m-vol .curr,
.m-playbar .listbd .scrol,.u-btni-addply,
.u-btni-add,
.m-top{
    background-color:rgba(102,204,255,1);
    background:rgba(102,204,255,1);
}

.m-playbar .list li.z-sel {
    background:rgba(102,204,255,.4);
}

.m-playbar .list li.z-sel:hover {
    background:rgba(102,204,255,.7);
}

.m-playbar .list li:hover {
    background:rgba(102,204,255,.2);
}

.m-playbar .listbd .bline {
    background:rgba(102,204,255,.4);
}

/*background-color,background为副颜色*/
.m-subnav,
.m-nav .cor,
.m-vol .btn{
    background-color:rgba(102,136,255,1);
    background:rgba(102,136,255,1);
}

/*搜索框激活后颜色*/
.m-srch .srchbg:after{
    border-top-color:rgba(102,136,255,1);
}



@keyframes load {
    from {
        background:rgba(102,136,255,1);
    }
    50% {
        background: #fff
    }
    to {
        background:rgba(102,136,255,1);
    }
}
}

*/

#j-music-ad,.adsbydm{display:none}
